Item.Description: A Kingdom that profits from buying and selling goods across the region. They have a great variety and amount of items, but the prices are a little bit higher than other merchants.
A Kingdom whose primary export is stone and ore, which they offer at a reduced rate. They are willing to trade more for basic supplies like food, drink, wood, bandages, and pick axes.
A Kingdom whose primary export are logs, which they offer at a reduced rate. They are willing to trade more for basic supplies like food, drink, bandages and felling axes.

A Kingdom whose primary export is food, drink, cloth, and animal products, which they offer at a reduced rate. They're willing to pay more for supplies such as seeds, straw, wood, stone blocks, and metal bars.
